# scrollRangeToVisible(_:)

**Instance Method**

Scrolls the text view until the text in the specified range is visible.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func scrollRangeToVisible(_ range: NSRange)
```

## Parameters

- **range**: The range of text to scroll into view.

## Working with the selection

- **selectedRange**: The current selection range of the text view.
- **clearsOnInsertion**: A Boolean value that indicates whether inserting text replaces the previous contents.
- **isSelectable**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the text view is selectable.
